Haha, that's awesome! It's great to see talent being recognized :) Grats, Tom!!

\* Sees in Tom's work what I surmised was a Sweetheart Fiora skin ult *\

https://cdna2.artstation.com/p/assets/images/images/003/392/398/large/thomas-randby-ult5.jpg?1473207858

"... Fiora is not a sweetheart. She would put anyone down that called her a sweetheart... with extreme prejudice... and multiple references to peasants."

\* Sees HEARTSEEKER skin next to it \*

https://cdnb1.artstation.com/p/assets/images/images/002/032/677/large/thomas-randby-heartseeker-fiora.jpg?1456260703

"... Oh... well... that works. She's totally a heartseeker... just... not in the usual way. +1"
